summary: Frontend testing completed for pet grooming app. All 8 requested features verified working. Fixed critical bug: Add Customer and Add Service buttons were missing due to prop name mismatch (action vs actions).
passed_tests: Login flow with foti@mayaspetgrooming.com.au / Maya2024! - PASSED
Calendar timeline red line shows correct position at current time (07:09) - PASSED
Mobile navigation shows Calendar, Customers, Services, Invoices, More - PASSED
Customers page Add Customer button visible and clickable - PASSED (after fix)
Services page Add Service button visible and clickable - PASSED (after fix)
Items page accessible from direct URL /items - PASSED
Settings page backup button shows 'Backup' (smaller text) - PASSED
Customer detail page has Save to Contacts button - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Customers.jsx and Services.jsx were using 'action' prop but PageHeader component expects 'actions' (plural) - this caused Add buttons to not render
Calendar timeline position calculation is correct: (hours * 80 + minutes/60 * 80) * zoomLevel + 120px padding
Save to Contacts feature uses vCard format (.vcf file download) for native contact saving
Mobile navigation correctly shows 5 items: Calendar, Customers, Services, Invoices, More
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working. Fixed prop name bug in Customers.jsx and Services.jsx (action -> actions). Test user: foti@mayaspetgrooming.com.au/Maya2024!. Customer 'Ayush' exists with pet 'Sanu' and 11 appointments.

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.fix: Changed action= to actions= on line 147
Changed action= to actions= on line 95
